bug.author: MayankSingal
bug.summary: Hey! Just found out that your repository copies code from mine. Can I get credits? Thank you!
bug.description: Hello Avinash! I just randomly stumbled onto this repository. It was weird to find out that you have copied most of the working code from my repository <denchmark-link:https://github.com/TheFairBear/Super-SlowMo>https://github.com/TheFairBear/Super-SlowMo</denchmark-link> . Can I please get credits? Thank you!

comments.comment: Yes, I did use your code as base mostly in the train.py. But I also added things from scratch trying to get the network to converge and make the repository more accessible. I have added your repository in the references. Thanks for your work!
